name: minelol
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/'), url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com/')   { body {background: url('http://i53.tinypic.com/34exh1k.jpg') top left #2B2B2B no-repeat fixed !important;} #left_column, #right_column {background-color: transparent !important;}

div.l-content.l-content.l-content {background-color:#A7A8AC !important; background: rgba(115,117,119,0.3) !important;} *{text-shadow:none !important; color:#fffff !important;} ol#posts li.notification{background-color: #000000 !important; border-bottom: 2px solid #A7A8AC !important; color: #000000 !important;opacity: .50;} #right_column a#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current:hover {background:#FDECF0;opacity: .50;} #nav .nav_item.active{background-color:#FDECF0} #left_column #posts .post .permalink{background-color:#A7A8AC;opacity: .50;} #dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current, #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_and_divider, #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_current {background-image:none !important} .selection_nipple.white, .selection_nipple:not([class="selection_nipple white"]) {  	background: none !important; 	width: 0px !important; 	height: 0px !important; 	margin-top: 0px !important; 	border-bottom: solid 11px white !important; 	border-right: 11px solid transparent !important; 	border-left: 11px solid transparent !important; } .selection_nipple:not([class="selection_nipple white"]) { 	border-bottom: solid 11px #404141 !important; opacity: .5;} .notification_type_icon{display:none !important} .selected .following, .selected .followers, .selected .settings, .selected .posts, .selected .messages, .selected .drafts, .selected .queue,  .selected .likes { 	color: #A7A8AC !important;  	background: #2B2B2B !important;} a.explore_more_tags, a.add_and_remove, a.customize, a.mass_editor 	{background-color:#2B2B2B !important;   	background-image:none !important; 	border:0px !important} div.gradient, div.dashboard_nav_item,  a.permalink 	{background-color:#2B2B2B !important; 	opacity:.9;  	background-image:none !important; 	border:0px !important} .content.is_media,  .mask.top,  .mask.bottom { 	background: none !important; } .post.photo_post .photo,  .post.photo_post .video_thumbnail { 	border-radius: 16px !important;} .post.photo_post .photo,  .post.photo_post .video_thumbnail  	{-moz-box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #000000 !important;} #auto_pagination_loader 	{background: #A7A8AC !important;} div.return_to_top_icon{	background: none !important; 	width: 0px !important; 	height: 0px !important; 	margin-top: 0px !important; 	border-bottom: solid 30px white !important; 	border-right: 15px solid transparent !important; 	border-left: 15px solid transparent !important;} #left_column #posts .notification { background-color:#A7A8AC !important; color:#000000 !important; border-bottom-color: #eee !important} #left_column #posts .post .post_avatar{-moz-border-radius: 38px !important; -webkit-border-radius: 60px !important; width: 64px !important; height: 64px !important; margin: 0px !important;} #left_column #posts .post .sub_avatar_inner { -moz-border-radius: 38px !important; -webkit-border-radius: 60px !important; width: 32px !important; height: 32px !important; margin: 0px !important;} #new_post_notice_container{ color:#fff !important} #new_post_notice_container a{ color:#fff !important} ol#posts li.post.new_post { background: #ffffff url('http://i56.tinypic.com/n1cebo.png') center center no-repeat;} img[src*="http://assets.tumblr.com/images/new_post_icons_no_labels.png"]{     width:0;     height:70px;     padding-right:250px;     opacity: 0; } ol#posts .post.new_post .new_post_label { display:none !important;} .permalink {background: none !important; width: 16px !important; height: 16px !important;   background: #FDECF0) !important;   border-bottom-left-radius: 10px !important;   border-top-right-radius: 10px !important;   margin-top: 3px !important;   margin-right: 4px !important;} #logo {height: 0 !important; width: 0 !important; padding-left: 207px !important; padding-top: 43px !important; background: url(http://i53.tinypic.com/219nrlt.gif) no-repeat !important;} .sub_avatar{width:32px !important; height:32px !important; background-color:transparent !important}}
